bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
libtomcrypt and libtommath have a wrong URL in their .spec (www.libtom.org). The domain seems to have been taken by a foreign party. Google suggests www.libtom.net or github.com/libtom/libtom{crypt,math}.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): libtomcrypt-1.17-29.fc25 libtomcrypt-1.17-23.el7 (EPEL) libtommath-1.0-4.fc24 (in F25) libtommath-0.42.0-4.el7 (EPEL)
libtomcrypt-1.17-30.20160123git912eff4.fc25 libtommath-1.0-6.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-3f2628b1a6
libtommath-0.42.0-5.el6 libtomcrypt-1.17-24.el6 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 6. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-1490b54059

libtomcrypt-1.17-30.20160123git912eff4.fc24, libtommath-1.0-6.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-7a7e076af8
